metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47090 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: NATS nats-server before 2.9.23 and 2.10.x before 2.10.2 has anauthentication bypass. An implicit $G user in an authorization block cansometimes be used for unauthenticated access, even when the intention ofthe configuration was for each user to have an account. The earliestaffected version is 2.2.0.

criterions.comment: nats-server package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
